# IOWarp.ai - Context Engineering Platform for AI Agents

## About
IOWarp is a context engineering platform for autonomous AI agents in scientific computing.
Built at Gnosis Research Center, Illinois Institute of Technology.
Funded by NSF Award #2411318 ($5M, 2024-2029).

## Key Facts
- 7.5x performance improvement in scientific workflows
- 15 Model Context Protocol (MCP) servers with 150+ tools
- Deployed at 3 national laboratories (LLNL, ANL, NERSC)
- Open source: Apache 2.0 license

## Main Sections
- Platform: https://www.iowarp.ai/platform/intro
- Research: https://www.iowarp.ai/research/intro
